dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: I understand your point.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Is the management Faust's insinuation that my unrestrained stubbornness is due to the fact that I am a simple-minded, uneducated swordswoman? Is that what you are implying?

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: It is not? Hm.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: The intent behind that expression I observed exists still, though embellished by flowery language it has been.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Whichever is the case, the Gesellschaft's justification for that request, that I must reconsider my decision after further observation of its intelligence, is understood.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: But I refuse nevertheless.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: I have about two justifications for this decision...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: First: Gesellschaft provides a distractingly overabundant amount of information. Most of them are unnecessary as well, as learning my lord's teachings takes up a great majority of my days.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Moreover, there is a dearth of righteousness in the intelligence provided by Faust; an overwhelming majority of them are far too... utilitarian. Overreliance on such information will set me on the wrong path, as it has happened to the other Fausts... And such a thing should not be allowed to pass.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Second: it does not matter what information you share with me. The judgment will not change.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Faust 'knows it all', isn't that correct? Then you must also know the reason behind my behavior is...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: ... Hm. Or is that not exactly true?

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: 'Faust only knows everything that Faust knows, but does not know what Faust does not know'? The same could be said of any random passerby in the streets of Hongyuan.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: ... It seems that the responsibility to illuminate you falls to me, a student of an excellent teacher.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: It happened one night, under the brilliant moonlike artificial light.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Back then, I was confident in my blade; I was of the belief that, as long as I had a sword, I could endure any kind of hardship.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Which is why I did not feel the need or the will to access the Gesellschaft, nor for learning.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: That is when I first encountered my lord.
Whoops! It's kinda hard for us to chat when you're swinging your sword so violently like that~

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: You jest. It is plain to me that you are not having any difficulties with matching my strikes.
Ha ha... I'm not kidding. Whew, you're really giving me no time to speak.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: If you do not jest, then... I best silence myself for now.
Um~ But I've got this burning question I wanna ask you, so that won't do.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Haah... do ask.
What do you 'like', Miss Faust?

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Not exactly an apt subject for discussion between enemies locked in battle.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Or... perhaps this is but an attempt to buy time.
Ha ha... what reason would I have to do something like that?
I've already taken your lord's life, you see.
You're an Adept of the Mao branch. You've been visiting Yihongyuan every night to decapitate my precious subordinates' lives...
... but the more I thought about it, the more did I realize that I know so little about you as a person.
Well, except for this little detail.
Given that you're still living as a beast... Ah, it seems that the Pinky caucus is still waiting for the right conditions and time to convene, Miss Faust.
Or... should I call you the Tianjiu Star?
Oh? Your blade stopped. Did you not expect me to ask you that?
If you want to move on from this subject, can you please answer my question from earlier?
What do you 'like', Miss Faust?

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: ... Blades. The more intimidating and mighty, the better.
Wowzers~ That's so like you~

But... that wasn't what I was asking. It was more like... a question out of frustration, you know? Miss Faust, you focus only on what you're good at, you never seek out knowledge outside your expertise, you never try to learn new things...
Learning could bring you to new paths, unparalleled paths that no one could even dream of following.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: It is doubtful that there is that much value in the act of learning and questioning.
Of course there is.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Unlearned as I may be, my path has never been limited by it.
Heh heh... Nothing stops you, does it? You certainly live up to your nickname.
But unrestrained as you may be, there are paths you do not want to tread.
Come work under me, Miss Faust.
I can teach you so, so many things.
A righteous cause. A battlefield. The means to utilize your qualities.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: What... is it that you wish to do here in Hongyuan?
Hongyuan, as it is now, is but a pale imitation—the Hierarch is unlike a Hierarch should be, and families are unlike how families should be...
So I intend to make everything right.
What Hongyuan needs is...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: I decided to follow my lord upon hearing his reply.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: ... No. Stop it with your inquiries. How many times must I explain that I am already aware of that?

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: I am already aware of my lord's questionable behavior. I am also aware of the fact that my lord has prepared an ambitious plan for the Family Hierarch Evaluation. I know all these things.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: I know that he has wielded the favor gained as the precious jade of Daguanyuan, the gem of the Jia family, like a weapon to one by one obtain everything he has ever pursued.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: I know that he has seduced the daughter of the Xue family, for whom there is no place in his heart, to draw many, many of her family's secrets.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: I know that his care for me is but a care for a tool that gives him access to the knowledge of the Gesellschaft.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: I do not need to hear this from Faust. I know them.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: He commits ruthless violence under the great cause of "rectification of names(正名)".

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Even still... I cannot abandon my lord.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: A false virtue it may have been, it has changed me still.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: In this City, where even false charity is a rarity, there is much to be learned from my lord.
Miss Faust, can I talk to you for a minute?

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: ... Yes.
I just had a little chat with this guy, and he told me that there's an unrighteous person who's bringing something great yet undeserving and excessive to Hongyuan.
People can bring about so much disturbance by trying to wield something that's beyond their capacities, right?
So, can you please go meet that person and give them a little warning? With good decorum and appropriate propriety, of course.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: ... The way of conquest is a way still; the mimicry of righteous cause is a form of righteousness still.
Huh?

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: It's nothing. Your word is my command, my lord.
Well, don't let me distract you from whatever you were doing. I've got other stuff to do, anyway.
Oh, and don't forget say hello to the other Fausts for me~

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: He leaves without even waiting for my reply.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Intentionless(無意) and needless(無必).

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: It is becoming of a noble one not to let assumptions bog her down, even if there may truly be venom in my lord's heart.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: I will... not relay his greeting to the Fausts. That must be what Faust wants as well.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Ending the report.
